charges.charge_description: 18:894(a) RACKETEERING, EXTORTION CREDIT TRANSACT. knowingly conspire to participate in the use of extortionate means to collect an extension of credit &; knowingly conspire to use and expressly and implicitly threaten the use of violence to cause harm (1)

charges.charge_disposition: SENT: 33 mos. imprisonment as to count 1 of the indictment. SUPERVISED RELEASE: 3 yrs. FINE: $1,200. SA: $50. (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:1952(a)(2) EXTORTION, RACKETEERING, &; THREATS-did travel in interstate commerce w/intent to commit a crime of violence (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Count 2 is DISMISSED on the motion of the government. (2)

charges.charge_description: 18:1952(a)(2) EXTORTION, RACKETEERING, &; THREATS-did travel in interstate commerce w/intent to commit a crime of violence (2)

charges.charge_disposition: 27 months imprisonment. SUPERVISED RELEASE: three years (2)

charges.charge_description: 18:894(a) RACKETEERING, EXTORTION CREDIT TRANSACT. knowingly conspire to participate in the use of extortionate means to collect an extension of credit &; knowingly conspire to use and expressly and implicitly threaten the use of violence to cause harm (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Count one dismissed on the motion of the govt by the court (1)
